price: Wanamtakasa usiku na mchana, wala hawanyong'onyei.
footnotes: Wanamtakasa aliye tukuka shani yake na kila lisio muelekea. Kumtakasa huku hakusiti, bali huo ni mtakaso wa daima, hawana shughuli nyengine ya kuwashughulisha.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
